org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.filters
Class AeSQLReceiverFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeSQLFilter
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.filters.AeSQLReceiverFilter
public class AeSQLReceiverFilter
extends AeSQLFilter

Wraps the AeMessageReceiverFilter and uses its selection criteria to format the select statement and the matching criteria parameters.
